channel.title: [pi] run.bat for client
channel.description:
hey guys can someone give me a run.bat file for client. currently i have this and i need a small one without the opening cmd.
[code] @echo off title Edge pk - Loading color 0a
:start echo. echo ------------------------------------------------ echo Edge pk (x64), Starting up... echo ------------------------------------------------ if exist "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/" goto x64 goto x86
:x64 title Edge pk (x64) - Loader echo Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo. cd ./Class/ "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m client exit
:x86 title Edge pk (x86) - Loader echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo. cd ./Class/ "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m client exit [/code]

item.title: [pi] run.bat for client
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guys can someone give me a run.bat file for client. currently i have this and i need a small one without the opening cmd.

@echo off
title Edge pk - Loading
color 0a

:start
echo.
echo ------------------------------------------------
echo     Edge pk (x64), Starting up...
echo ------------------------------------------------
if exist "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/"  goto x64
goto x86

:x64
title  Edge pk (x64) - Loader
echo         Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo    . C l i e n t   o u t p u t   b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.
cd ./Class/
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m client
exit


:x86
title  Edge pk (x86) - Loader
echo         Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo    . C l i e n t   o u t p u t   b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.
cd ./Class/
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m client
exit
